definitions: (of a ball) kicked or hit with a high trajectory

examples.text: Vagner scored the game's only goal with a lofted long-range shot
a lofted pass went astray and Kowloon scored

shortDefinitions: kicked or hit with high trajectory

definitions: (of a golf club) having a head with backward slope

examples.text: a lot of people in this situation choose a lofted club that requires a long swing to get the ball up to the hole
the most lofted club in her bag was a 7-iron

shortDefinitions: denoting golf club having head with backward slope
